main event: A civilian reported sighting a bright gold star-shaped object with a round bottom drifting behind mountains in Villa Grove, Colorado, on June 24, 1957.
interesting points: The object was the size of a volleyball.,The sighting lasted for about 2 hours.,The object's flight path was straight with no maneuvers., The object was moving at a course of 315 degrees., The conclusion of the observation suggests that it was possibly a balloon.
sighted object: a bright gold star-shaped object with a round bottom
